Prompt.masterLabel: Updated Quote Assoc Error and Closing Opps

promptVersions.body:
There is a known issue when trying to Close/Book and Opportunity. This is a P1 issue, and IT is working as quickly as they can to fix the issue.


In the meantime, please forward the Quote number and the Opportunity number to nsc.administration@ncr.com. Our team will be able to close the Opportunities for you.


PLEASE do not send more than one request for the the Opportunity. This will only cause delays .


Thank you for your patience and understanding!ï»¿
